name: vanitas (xhaia)
description:
I made it for a uni project as mainly a test game. This is the first time i've made a game on uni.

Im not a very good artist but i am planning on improving my skills, especially in pixel art as i enjoy that style.

Hopefully this will be the first game of many on my itch.io page.

I don't really plan on updating it, but i might if i get bored or aren't working on any other projects.
